nodes.text: Ysanna was a human female aboard Tansarii Point Station. In 1 ABY, her husband was a soldier and part of a unit that was investigating disappearances on Station Gamma when they engaged the Rak'qua, a tribe of Nautolans that had overrun the space station. Her husband, however, did not return to Tansarii Point Station. Fearing for his safety, Ysanna contracted a spacer to travel to Station Gamma and bring back proof of what happened.

Ysanna's fears proved to be correct; the spacer discovered that Ysanna's husband had gone mad from the fighting on Station Gamma. After killing the now-crazed soldier, the spacer presented the soldier's datapad to Ysanna as proof of what had happened. Though grief-stricken at the loss of her husband, she paid the spacer 1,500 credits.

Ysanna's only appearance was in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She, along with the rest of Tansarii Point Station, was added in late 2005 as part of the New Game Enhancements. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
